short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight video player for local files with easy-to-use interface, offline support, and useful keyboard shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience hassle-free local video playback with our lightweight video player Chrome extension. 

With a user-friendly interface and helpful keyboard shortcuts, you can easily navigate and play your video files offline. 

Plus, our video player integrates with Chrome's live caption feature, making it a powerful tool for enhancing your learning experience. 

Simplify your video viewing and start using our extension today!
